title: Hey guys, I found what Veigar counters after his rework!

replies.body: He's great against bots because they walk right into the stun

Yes, Veigar does very well against Tutorial and Beginner bots, but may struggle against Intermediate bots due to their Q dodging mechanics.

{{summoner:4}}  {{summoner:6}}
Queue dodging is an important skill to have when you see a Veigar on your team.

Who's that CHAMPION!?

> It's {{champion:45}}
You can't *not* hear the music and group announcers

Old Veigar vs. Veigar matchups were actually pretty entertaining. It was this high-tension dance back and forth, and the first Veigar to land their stun obliterated the other. (Or, if they both missed, they were quite likely to blow each other up.)

Relevant video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jQ3uVzVJ-2E

Relevant.

https://33.media.tumblr.com/f4b0085a2a79df8892cf185b572c5009/tumblr_nbynmugrHQ1sdk5d7o1_500.gif
Dear god, Veigar's old walk animation...
Wow, for a moment I was wondering if I was the only one who thought he looked like a little penguin walking...
i was fking dying of laughter when i saw him walking
Oh god those were fun. If both of you were good, it was a deadly countdown of each others flash cooldown. Each second that ticked away was another sweat droplet running down your face. Good times.
My favorite factoid about new Veigar is that Veigar Bot doesn't even use Q anymore. In protest, I can only assume.
It MUST be a protest, as Zilean Bot uses HIS newly changed skillshot...
WRONG he actually **hard** counters bots.

W8 w8 w8 w8, are u trying to say that be picking Veigar im countering my own pick which is Veigar?!?!

Im..... so confused!
It's super effective!
Is that a short joke?
I just want to take this time to say fuck Riot and fuck their LCS, which I vow to never watch again because of shit like this.
I thought he countered the east coast...

{{champion:11}} 

His goggles will cause him to confuse Veiger for a minion.
Ill keep that in mind.

The only champion I stood a chance against was karthus lol

And its not like killing him made any difference so, well, veigar is ded
CLG Veigar confirmed
I was thinking lag
I knew was gonna be something like this. except I thought it would be "Nothing! Veiger is now worthless!"
:O

I thought you were going to say {{champion:28}}.

Still plesantly surprised.
veigar hard counters Zac midlane
